content: if you like my designs and would like to see more free designs in the future consider buying me a ko-fi 2 __________________________________________________ craft shows all over the country are being cancelled or postponed because of covid-19 well the nj wool walk is no exception we were planned for april 2-5 but we have postponed it and will be meeting in mid-may to determine a new date as many other crafters/stores i planned for months this pattern was written specifically for the nj wool walk 2020 i also created a limited edition colorway of the same name i cannot wait for months to release either so they are both being released today to get the limited edition yarn - click here 1 ************************************************* the vintage christmas shawl was knitted in * raspberry - pink * kale - green-blue * london blue topaz - green-blue speckle the wool walk shawl was knitted in * concord grape - purple * lannister - yellow * hindsight - 2020 wool walk colorway - variegated ******************************************************** 3 skeins of dk are needed 2 tonals and a variegated work well but complementary all tonals or anything goes this is also a great pattern for dk stash-busting this squishy garter stitch asymmetrical boomerang type shawl is knit without a single purl stitch squishy large and stylish this shawl can be knit by a beginner but is also interesting enough for an experienced knitter ************************************* 1 https //www yourlysonline com/collections/indie-dyed-yarn-by-rose/products/2020-nj-wool-walk-colorway-hindsight-multiple-bases-rts 2 https //ko-fi com/almapark
